title: Apple iTunes Incorrect Permission Assignment Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Apple iTunes. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the Apple Mobile Device Service. The issue results from incorrect permissions set on a resource used by the service. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of SYSTEM.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT213259
timeline:
2022-06-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-10-04 - Coordinated public release of advisory
